Package com.progmethgame.network

Class ServerBus

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.progmethgame.network.ServerBus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class ServerBus
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Server's communication bus. Provides communication (event source and event bus) to multiple clients. event should be handled by this bus's thread.
